step_original: National Document: Detonation resistance test (DRT) HSE certificate of exemption
step_description: Detonation resistance test (DRT) or HSE certificate of exemption
step_howto_description: Before importing goods that could be used for explosives, you will need to either undertake a Detonation Resistance Test (DRT) for your import or provide an HSE Certificate of Exemption.
step_get_text: See the HSE website for more information on importing explosives and exemptions
